snippet: European auto sales surged 15 percent in June, the biggest month-on-month increase in more than five years, the European carmakers’ association reported on Thursday.
lead_paragraph: European auto sales surged 15 percent in June, the biggest month-on-month increase in more than five years, the European carmakers’ association reported on Thursday.

headline.main: Car Sales Soar in Europe, but Recovery Called ‘Fragile’
headline.print_headline: Car Sales Soar In Europe, but Recovery Called ‘Fragile’
